thread.title: Khloe Kardashian Goes Naked on 'Strong Looks Better Naked' Book Cover
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian Goes Naked on 'Strong Looks Better Naked' Book Cover

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Khloe Kardashian Goes Naked on 'Strong Looks Better Naked' Book Cover
text:
Comments The 'Keeping Up with the Kardashians' star puts her bare derriere on full display but opts to cover her private parts with white sheet. 
Khloe Kardashian is completely naked on the cover of her upcoming memoir "Strong Looks Better Naked". The 31-year-old reality TV star flaunts her enviable curves while striking a seductive pose to the camera. The " Keeping Up with the Kardashians " star lies down on a white bed while giving a sultry stare to the camera. Khloe puts her bare derriere on full display but opts to cover her private parts with white sheet. The book includes how-to advice and lifestyle tips in addition to stories about Khloe's struggles with weight, relationships and her self-image. The reality star has lost at least 35 pounds due to her healthy lifestyle. Regarding her breakup with Lamar Odom , Khloe reportedly writes that it was due to his drink and drug abuse issues. According to Page Six, the reality TV star writes that every time she went outside, paparazzi followed her and asked, "Is it true Lamar cheated on you?" and "Is he doing drugs?" She writes, "Every day felt like an attack... It was also humiliating; it got to the point that leaving my house would give me social anxiety." However, the most recent report said that Khloe called off their divorce . At the end of the book, Khloe reportedly thanks Lamar for some of the best years of her life. She writes, "Before I met you I felt invisible, and after I felt seen." The book is set to be released on November 3.
